name: New Zealand White Rabbit
description: A popular breed known for its excellent meat quality and fast growth rate. Ideal for small-scale farming.

name: Californian Rabbit
description: Another excellent meat breed, known for its good meat-to-bone ratio and distinctive markings.

name: Rhode Island Red Hen
description: A versatile, dual-purpose breed valued for both its egg-laying capabilities and meat. Hardy and reliable.

name: Broiler Chicken
description: Specifically bred and raised for meat production. Known for rapid growth and efficiency.
